about_the_game:
Contract Cafe


The story takes place in a city on a continent where you, as Riko, the current manager of the café, receive a letter from an old friend. You promise to take care of a mysterious girl, Niya, bringing her into your world, sharing special moments with her, and helping her grow. In the beginning, whether it's your bond with Niya, joyful days with your team, or the peculiar stories from the shop, they all fill your life with happiness and warmth...

The café plays an irreplaceable role for everyone involved. You have to work hard to keep it running for Niya and for all the people around you. At the same time, a super powerful company that economically controls the city is watching and waiting to show its claws...

The truth about Niya's past, the challenges faced by your friends, the troubles in society, and the conflicts between humans and other beings all unfold in your café, making it the center of an unfolding drama...

Live freely in this city

Explore this evolving city, befriend a variety of customers, keep up with the latest coffee trends through casual chats and news, and improve and upgrade your struggling coffee shop by acquiring new supplies and equipment. Turn your little shop into a special spot in the city and immerse yourself in the story!"


Colorful and diverse characters

Protagonist: Riko. Niya.

Store Sisters: Taya. Tana.

Courier: Remlin.

Based on the original characters created by the renowned artist AIKOlik, there are as many as 18 key characters!

About us

Igame Studio is a young collective formed by passionate young people about gaming. "Contract Café" is our debut work, poured with all our efforts to win your love and affection!If you choose to add the game to your shopping cart, we would greatly appreciate it.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains some nudity, pornography, foul language and violence.

name: Contract Cafe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: As Riko Feen, you manage a quaint café teetering on the edge of closure. But when a surprising letter arrives, everything shifts—now you must adopt Niya, a girl with a mysterious past. Amidst your efforts to rescue the café and navigate peculiar customers, secrets about the shop begin to surface...
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
